item.title: About
item.description: Heyyyyy there! ðŸ”—ðŸ’» I’m Nihar, a versatile tech enthusiast with a strong commitment to knowledge sharing and innovation. I wear multiple hats as a YouTuber and Instagram tech influencer, where I focus on teaching coding, MERN Stack development, and engaging in in-depth discussions about the ever-evolving tech landscape. My genuine love for AI adds an extra layer of excitement to my tech journey. My journey doesn’t stop at content creation; I’m also a motivational speaker, driven by the belief that the right mindset can be a catalyst for personal and professional growth.
